landpage.title: Photo Delivery Platform with Facial Recognition
landpage.description: Automate your workflow. Photon Cloud identifies faces, creates individual galleries for each client, and delivers photos with speed and precision.

signin.title: Log In to Photon Cloud
signin.description: Access your dashboard. Manage your events, galleries, and automated photo deliveries in one place.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.description: Join Photon Cloud. Sign up and start streamlining your photography workflow with artificial intelligence.

confirm-code.title: Verify Email
confirm-code.description: Security step. Please confirm the code sent to your email to validate your access to the Photon platform.

address.title: Complete Registration
address.description: Finish setting up your account by providing your address details for billing and contracts.

finish.title: Account Confirmed
finish.description: All set! Your email has been verified and your Photon Cloud account is active and secure.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: Set a new secure password to regain access to your account and events.

recovery-sent.title: Recovery Email Sent
recovery-sent.description: Check your inbox. We have sent the necessary instructions for you to securely reset your password.

forgot-password.title: Recover Access
forgot-password.description: Forgot your password? Start the secure recovery process to regain access to your Photon Cloud account.

legal_hub.title: Legal Center
legal_hub.description: Access Photon's Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and legal documentation. Transparency and trust for professional photographers.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.description: Read the User Agreement for Photon Cloud. Understand your rights, responsibilities, and the rules governing the use of our platform.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Learn how Photon collects, uses, and protects your personal data. We are committed to data security and global privacy compliance.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Strategic overview. Track the performance of your recent events, storage usage, and Photon activities.

index.title: Client Management
index.description: Organize your client base, view profiles, event history, and gallery access status.

complete_registration.title: Complete Client Profile
complete_registration.description: Fill in pending registration data to ensure correct contract generation and invoicing.

create_by_image.title: Smart Import
create_by_image.description: Speed up your work by automatically creating client profiles by reading file names.

profile.title: Client Profile
profile.description: Client information hub. Access signed contracts, personal galleries, and contact details.

index.title: Contract Management
index.description: Full control over your legal documents. Create, send, and monitor digital signature status.

index.title: My Events
index.description: Complete list of your photography events. Monitor facial recognition progress and deliveries.

workspace.title: Event Workspace
workspace.description: Photographer's workspace. Upload photos, manage curation, and track AI indexing.

send_photo.title: Upload Photos
send_photo.description: Send high-resolution files for processing. Our AI will start organizing photos as soon as the upload finishes.
